TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Troll. You must try again!
There is no obvious sign of Embraxus the Dragon here. His cave looks empty.
You cannot find Embraxus the Dragon, but you do find a small amount of treasure on the Troll who was in his cave.
This Troll is slightly larger and tougher than normal; his giant claws allow him to cast the Rend spell.
